description: React component implementing a client-side Tic Tac Toe game page, including game logic, UI rendering, and interaction handling.

methods.name: getWinner
methods.description: Determines the winner of the Tic Tac Toe game by checking predefined winning line combinations.

methods.name: isBoardFull
methods.description: Checks if all cells on the board are filled, indicating a draw if there's no winner.

methods.name: Home
methods.description: Main React component representing the Tic Tac Toe game page, managing game state and rendering UI.
